body: We are ignoring the use_calibration parameter when precision is not INT8 because calibration doesn't make sense for FP32 or FP16. But if you are talking about in the future when we have INT4 then I can see the issue.
body_html: We are ignoring the use_calibration parameter when precision is not INT8 because calibration doesn't make sense for FP32 or FP16. But if you are talking about in the future when we have INT4 then I can see the issue.
body_text: We are ignoring the use_calibration parameter when precision is not INT8 because calibration doesn't make sense for FP32 or FP16. But if you are talking about in the future when we have INT4 then I can see the issue.
